alert.note: Alert for Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Southern Denali Borough (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 25 at 5:28AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...Blowing Snow And Cold Wind Chills In Alaska Range Passes This Weekend... Snow and blowing snow with low visibility are expected to develop through Alaska Range Passes Friday afternoon and continue into Sunday. North winds gusting to 40 mph are expected along with wind chills to 50 below. Between 8 and 10 inches of snow are expected this weekend in Isabell Pass along the Richardson Highway where large snow drifts will form and make travel very difficult south of Trims Camp. The Parks Highway south of Denali Park is expecting several inches of snow this weekend and will also see drifting snow with possible travel difficulty this weekend.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Alaska Range South of Trims Camp; Southern Denali Borough
